description:
God`s Right Seat is a secret magical organization within the http://anidb.net/ch26157 [Roman Catholic Church]. Referred to as the true dark side of the Roman Catholic Church by http://anidb.net/ch101834 [Leivinia Birdway], they are a group composed of powerful magicians aligned with the four Archangels.
Source: Toaru Wiki
name: Kami no Useki
